name: Subfear
description:
You wake up on a ransacked subway with no recollection on how you got there. You do know one thing however, something's out there and seems to want in.

You must try to escape the tunnels before the train becomes your metal tomb, while staying as quiet as possible so whatever is out there doesn't get in.

You must control the train using the throttle in the control room, while being as quiet as possible when you hear the monster. Sometimes the monster will turn on some loud appliances, so make sure to turn those off quietly!

Good Luck.

Left Click - Interact

Right Click - Torch

WASD - Move
